name: Biker Garage
description:
The game allows you to be a motorcycle mechanic. This is not only about motorcycle repair, but also everything that is associated with running this business. Find deals in online auctions, repair motorcycles and sell at a profit. Sound budget management will allow you to grow. You can invest in more motorcycles to repair and develop your workshop.



You start your adventure in a small home workshop and grow it to become the best motorcycle workshops in the world. Test your bikes on a track, check the quality of your repairs and performance that can be improved by fine-tuning.



You can choose from 4 types of motorcycles: Chopper, Naked, Sport and Tourist. You get to choose which motorcycles you want to repair.
